TopicTitle: Can't recover or return to Space Center

Articles.Content:
I just splashed down in the ocean, and when hitting "Recover Vessel", nothing happens. Then I tried to return to the Space Center, through the main menu, and that didn't work either. I had to quit the game to do anything.

Mod installed: MechJeb 2.4.1, although I haven't researched any MJ modules or used it in the game.

ETA: Upon restarting and going to R&D, I tried to quit out of R&D, and this happened (see upper-right corner and lower-right corner). The message log button is now overlaid over the close button. Neither close button works. Now I can't quit from R&D or even quit to the main menu, so again I had to kill the app.

So I removed MechJeb and it's still doing it. The game is basically unplayable at this point, as near as I can tell.

ETA 2: In that save, clicking on the VAB or the Tracking Station does nothing, now. Clicking on the Astronaut Complex brings it up, and I can leave it, but then nothing in the game works. Nothing is clickable. The save is corrupted apparently.

Edited December 16, 2014 by RocketBlam
Please read the How to Get Support (READ FIRST) sticky and post the requested information.

Here is a link to the log file.

This isn't a clean install, I just removed all my old mods after installing the .90 update, so there could be an issue there. I can do a clean install if you want. In fact I'm going to do that now.
I uninstalled and reinstalled, but left the save game there. It's still doing it, so it's corrupt, I assume.

I uninstalled and reinstalled, but left the save game there. It's still doing it, so it's corrupt, I assume.

Ok, you need to also make a new game instead of testing with your old save.

Also, what DID happen to the Androsynth???

Also, what DID happen to the Androsynth???

I am *squeezing* the *juice*!

Edited December 16, 2014 by RocketBlam
This exact same thing is happening to me. I've tried everything, uninstall, reinstall, only had 1 mod (Kerbal engineer). So very frustrating!
This has nothing to do with all your mods, it is caused by FinePrint.

I am constantly experiencing this as well, to the point where the game is basically impossible to play.

I've tried both a clean, unmodded install, and a modded one. It seems to happen in particular when 2 crafts get close together and especially after docking/grabbing. The debug screen is clearly showing a NullRefException but nothing more than that...
